subject: How to write a Build file which looks at build xml in sub directories
msgSnippet: Hi, I need help to write a Build file which goes to subfolder first, builds the subfolder and then come at root to do the final build. Thanks & Regards,
messageBody:
Hi,

I need help to write a Build file which goes to subfolder first, builds the
subfolder and then come at root to do the final build.



Thanks & Regards,
Devendra.
